Text: Antichamber is a single-player first-person puzzle-platform video game created by Alexander Bruce.

2:
--------------------
Text: Antichamber:  The game includes elements of psychological exploration through brief messages of advice to help the player figure out solutions to the puzzles as well as adages for real life.

Text: Antichamber:  The game was released on Steam for Microsoft Windows on January 31, 2013, a version sold with the Humble Indie Bundle 11 in February 2014 added support for Linux and Mac OS X.
